column4: gnomefreak> any idea why channel user list is not showing in xchat? Has it been disables somehow or has my theme experiment somehow gone awry? :/
gnome are you using cli irc client?
gnome> yes...i don't have it
gnome> I'm on 2.4.4...but it never disappeared before
gnome> yes...the one you can right click names
how?
gnome> window is maxxed
grap the scratchy looking thing on the right side with your mouse, and pull it to the left
you can resize the userlist pane till it disappears; you can bring it back by pulling on the vertical bar, and the horizontal lines in the center on the right is a visual aid
you can edit that by right clicking an appropriate file (say mp3), selecting properties, and using the open with tab.
If I read that right, you would right click a text file, and remove jive from the properties dialog
so, right click a text file, select properties a the bottom. You'll see a tab called Open with on the properties window; select that, and remove jive.
I'm not sure
it's in multiverse
if I remember rightly, that's for the animations of the panel itself. Window ani's are controlled by metacity
with a deep grey mist obscuring the distance :)
sometimes interrupted by a blue screen
I haven't seen one of those in years, except for screensavers
really?
really :)

xorg is just the forked xfree86, after all.
